voice.help: The voice to be cloned. located in the voices folder.

voice_directory.help: The directory where the voices are stored.

OV_SPEAKER.help: The locale used to generate the intermediate voice. (don't recommend changing), options: see error

Melo_Language.help: The locale used to generate the intermediate voice. (don't recommend changing), options: see error

OV_MODEL.help: The speaker id used to generate the intermediate voice. (don't recommend changing) options: en-au  en-br  en-default  en-india  en-newest  en-us  es  fr  jp kr  zh

output.help: The output path to save the generated wav. (if dir the name of the wav will be based on the input)

device.help: The device that torch will use to generate the audio. (auto, cuda, cpu)

input.help: The input path to the pdf file to be converted to speech.

ckpt_path.help: The path to the checkpoints from myshell.

keep_intermediate.help: If true, the intermediate files will be kept.

chunk_size.help: Splits the voice generation every x words. This is used to avoid running out of vram/ram.
